languages.text: {n}Соломон застывает, как статуя, и медленно, чужим голосом произносит:{/n} "Приказ принят, Вольный Торговец".
{n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон застывает, как статуя, и медленно, чужим голосом произносит:{/n} "Приказ принят, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne goes still as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."
{n}Solomorne goes still as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."
{n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."
{n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."
{n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."
{n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne erstarrt zu einer Statue. Langsam erklärt er mit einer Stimme, die nicht ihm gehören zu scheint:{/n} "Befehl erhalten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne erstarrt zu einer Statue. Langsam erklärt er mit einer Stimme, die nicht ihm gehören zu scheint:{/n} "Befehl erhalten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne reste aussi silencieux qu'une statue pendant un instant. Puis, d'une voix qui ne ressemble pas à la sienne, il dit lentement :{/n} « Bien reçu, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne reste aussi silencieux qu'une statue pendant un instant. Puis, d'une voix qui ne ressemble pas à la sienne, il dit lentement :{/n} « Bien reçu, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙仿佛雕像一样安静。他以仿佛不属于他自己的声音，慢慢开了口。{/n}“收到命令，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙仿佛雕像一样安静。他以仿佛不属于他自己的声音，慢慢开了口。{/n}“收到命令，行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne queda tan inmóvil como si fuera una estatua. Lentamente, con una voz que no parece la suya, responde:{/n} «Orden recibida, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne queda tan inmóvil como si fuera una estatua. Lentamente, con una voz que no parece la suya, responde:{/n} «Orden recibida, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは彫像のように静かになった。ゆっくりと、本人の声とは思えない調子で言う。{/n}「了解です、ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは彫像のように静かになった。ゆっくりと、本人の声とは思えない調子で言う。{/n}「了解です、ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sessizliğiyle âdeta bir heykeli andırıyor. Hiç acele etmeden, kendisininkine benzemeyen bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne goes quiet as a statue. Slowly, in a voice that does not sound like his own, he says,{/n} "Order received, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sessizliğiyle âdeta bir heykeli andırıyor. Hiç acele etmeden, kendi sesine benzemeyen bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Emredersiniz Hür Tacir."
